name: Prototype Rancour

refinement_effect.refine_one: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
refinement_effect.refine-two: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 7% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

description: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.
